image_publisher.cpp
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 //
2 // Created by Asgeir Bj√∏rkedal on 22.02.16.
3 //
4 #include <ros/ros.h>
5 #include <image_transport/image_transport.h>
6 #include <opencv2/highgui/highgui.hpp>
7 #include <cv_bridge/cv_bridge.h>
8 #include <sstream> // for converting the command line parameter to integer
9 
10 int main(int argc, char** argv)
11 {
12  // Check if video source has been passed as a parameter
13  if(argv[1] == NULL) return 1;
14 
15  ros::init(argc, argv, "image_publisher");
16  ros::NodeHandle nh;
17  image_transport::ImageTransport it(nh);
18  image_transport::Publisher pub = it.advertise("camera/image", 1);
19 
20  // Convert the passed as command line parameter index for the video device to an integer
21  std::istringstream video_sourceCmd(argv[1]);
22  int video_source;
23 
24  // Check if it is indeed a number
25  if(!(video_sourceCmd >> video_source)) return 1;
26 
27  cv::VideoCapture capture;
28  // Check if video device can be opened with the given index
29  if(!capture.open(video_source)) return 1;
30 
31  // Set resolution
32  capture.set(CV_CAP_PROP_FRAME_WIDTH, 1280);
33  capture.set(CV_CAP_PROP_FRAME_HEIGHT, 720);
34 
35  // Frame to temporary store capture image
36  cv::Mat frame;
37  sensor_msgs::ImagePtr msg;
38 
39  ros::Rate loop_rate(30);
40  while (nh.ok()) {
41  capture >> frame;
42  // Check if grabbed frame is actually full with some content
43  if(!frame.empty()) {
44  msg = cv_bridge::CvImage(std_msgs::Header(), sensor_msgs::image_encodings::BGR8, frame).toImageMsg();
45  pub.publish(msg);
46  cv::waitKey(1);
47  }
48 
49  ros::spinOnce();
50  loop_rate.sleep();
51  }
52 }
